summary: Senior operations executive with extensive experience leading multi-site medical practices and commercial banks. Expertise in strategic planning, financial analysis, cost containment, revenue growth, cross-functional leadership, and complex negotiations.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer
experience.description: Oversaw all aspects of a 5-clinic radiation oncology medical practice. Achievements included revenue growth, opening new clinics, expansion of services, and cost savings from vendor negotiations and loan refinancings. Implemented board meeting improvements and led strategic capital projects; contributed to expansion of services (Urology, mobile Brachytherapy) and increased annual revenue.

experience.title: Vice President and Commercial Banker
experience.description: Joined as VP and Commercial Banker with no loan portfolio; grew portfolio to over $30M in outstandings and $50M in commitments within three years. Subsequent promotions to SVP and SWWA Commercial Banking Manager; managed 8 lenders; expanded geographic coverage from Auburn to Longview; contributed to deposit growth, fee income exceeding $1.2M annually, and served on the Loan Committee with due diligence for potential bank acquisitions.
